name: Escape The Past
description: Stuck on this island, you have only one thing in your mind... Escape ! It's time for you to uncover the secrets of your life. Fight what you created and accept its consequences. Are you ready to escape your past ? In this new escape game, try to solve all the enigmas through several oneiric landscapes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/8/10 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated to the motherboard Storage: 500 MB available space
